title: Strong Financial Services Sector
description: In 2024, Cambodia achieved an impressive overall score of 86.03 in the Financial Services sector, indicating a robust financial infrastructure.

title: High Women's Participation in Decision-Making
description: As of 2022, 87.8% of Cambodian women aged 15-49 participated in key decision-making areas, reflecting significant gender empowerment.

title: Effective Debt Policy Management
description: In 2023, Cambodia's debt policy was rated 5 out of 6, showcasing effective management of national debt.

title: Low Medium and High-Tech Manufacturing Contribution
description: In 2022, medium and high-tech manufacturing contributed only 0.26% to Cambodia's manufacturing value added, highlighting a need for technological advancement.

title: Minimal Fuel Export Contribution
description: Fuel exports accounted for a negligible 0.0000034% of Cambodia's merchandise exports in 2022, indicating limited reliance on fuel exports.

title: Low Private Investment in Water and Sanitation
description: In 2023, Cambodia attracted only $2.3 million in private investment for water and sanitation, suggesting room for improvement in infrastructure investment.

title: Limited Public-Private Partnerships in Water and Sanitation
description: In 2022, public-private partnerships in Cambodia's water and sanitation sector amounted to $7 million, indicating potential for growth.

title: Negative Net Acquisition of Financial Assets
description: In 2021, Cambodia's net acquisition of financial assets was negative, at -4.2 trillion LCU, reflecting financial challenges.

title: Challenges in Business Entry Operational Efficiency
description: By 2024, Cambodia scored 9 in the operational efficiency of business entry, indicating challenges in streamlining business processes.

title: Weak Infrastructure for Judicial Insolvency Proceedings
description: In 2024, Cambodia's infrastructure for judicial insolvency proceedings scored 3.33, highlighting areas for improvement in legal frameworks.
